Study site

Tian Daoyi's study site.

go!

Learning is the ladder of human progress and the source of wisdom.

It is like a clear stream that nourishes our thoughts and moistens our soul in the journey of life.

Through learning, we can constantly broaden our horizons and gain knowledge; improve our abilities, master more skills; challenge ourselves continually and realize our self-worth.

As the saying goes, "There are roads to the top of a mountain, and diligent people will take them; there are boats sailing on the sea, and persevering people will ride them."

This tells us that as long as we are willing to work hard and learn, we can swim freely in the sea of knowledge and harvest a piece of our own world.

Therefore, let us seize the opportunity, keep learning, and become a better self!
